p: The clinical symptoms of the infected students are described in Table 1 . All 12 infected individuals had a fever; 9 (75%) students had a sore throat, and 8(66.67%) students had a headache. Other symptoms reported by the patients were cough, body ache, stuffy nose, and diarrhea. All affected students had normal white blood counts. Most of the infected students were treated in outpatient clinics; only one patient, who had non-severe pneumonia, was hospitalized.
